resources.string:
benefits of plank 
 1. improves posture 
 2. balance and coordination 
 3. improves body alignment 
 4. builds core strength 
 5. Improves Flexibility 
 6. improves metabolism 
 7. improves overall mental health.

benefits of lunges 
 1. Strengthens lower body muscles 
 2. Improves balance 
 3. increase flexibility 
 4. enhance functional fitness and improve athletic performance. 
 5. correct muscle imbalances 
 6. boost metabolism

benefits of high stepping 
 1. improves overall fitness 
 2. helps reduce fat 
 3. boosts cardiovascular strength 
 4. best exercise for weight loss

Benefits of crunches 
 1. Strengthens ab muscles 
 2. improves core stability 
 3. time efficiency 
 4. no equipment required

Benefits of push ups 
 1. Targets multiple muscle groups 
 2. increases upper body strength 
 3. good for core 
 4. improves posture 
 5. supports bone health 
 6. improves heart health

Benefits of squats 
 1. Targets multiple muscle groups 
 2. Targets your glutes and quadriceps. 
 3. good for core 
 4. Strengthens hip muscles 
 5. Strengthens calf muscles 
 6. Strengthens hamstrings 
 7. Strengthens obliques
